tool.name: includeScore
tool.description: of a DESeq list in a GFF file

param.name: GFF_input
param.label: GFF file to enrich with scores

param.name: score_column
param.label: value of the log2 fold-change column

tool.help:
**What it does**
takes a tabular DESeq2 result and a GFF file in inputs and returns the GFF lines corresponding to genes with p-adj under the indicated limit and enriched with the fold-changes observed for those genes in the GFF score column
